data.title: Career Peer Advising Program
data.meta_site_name: Pomerantz Career Center - The University of Iowa
data.text:
Elisa Burba

Hometown

Marietta, GA

Majors/Minors

English and History, Gender, Women’s, and Sexuality Studies minor

Career Goals

After completing my undergraduate degree, I hope to enter graduate school with the eventual goal of obtaining a Ph.D. in History and becoming a professor.

Hobbies/Fun Facts

I love to read and crochet, and whenever I am stressed, you can always find me baking something. I also have a cat named Yennifer, and my favorite thing to do is talk about her.

Pakshal Jain

Hometown

Iowa City, IA

Majors/Minors

Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

Career Goals

My career goal is to become a software engineer in the industry. My goal is to build new technologies and, ultimately, either start my own business or lead a company!

Hobbies/Fun Facts

I enjoy working out, playing sports like tennis and basketball, reading, and playing video games!

Previous Internships

Collins Aerospace, Cedar Rapids, IA; National Advanced Driving Simulator, Coralville, IA

Meg Callaghan

Hometown

I went to high school in Newton, Iowa but am from Texas and live in El Campo!

Majors/Minors

Nursing, Business Minor

Career Goals

I am majoring in Nursing with hopes to go to graduate school to obtain my DNP (Doctor of Nursing Practice). I will work as a nurse practitioner with emphasis in either women's health or oncology. After I get my DNP, I want to get my CRNA (certified registered nurse anesthetist) certification and work with patients undergoing surgical procedures.

Hobbies/Fun Facts

I love to play pickleball, run, and watch the Houston Astros. A fun fact about me is that I can play the ukulele.

Lucas Chi

Hometown

Kaohsiung, Taiwan

Majors/Minors

Finance

Career Goals

Upon graduation, I see myself in some kind of finance-related industry. I am fascinated about the idea of being financially literate, and my career goal is to help others to be financially literate.

Hobbies/Fun Facts

I am half Korean and half Taiwanese. I like working out, playing chess, and playing basketball.

Kristen Noel

Hometown

Dubuque, IA

Majors/Minors

Management (Human Resources), Psychology, & Education Studies and Human Relations

Career Goals

After completing my undergraduate degrees, I plan to pursue a career in human resources and possibly attend graduate school. I think it would be very compelling to work closely with others in an organization that uses its influence and resources to make a positive impact on people and the planet. No matter the path I end up going down, I will always aim to be a lifelong learner.

Hobbies/Fun Facts

I love reading, finding new music, hanging out with my cats, and all things Halloween. My favorite TV show is Gilmore Girls and my favorite movies are Coraline (2009) and Empire Records (1995).

Laura Sitz

Hometown

Davenport, IA

Majors/Minors

Accounting, Political Science Minor

Career Goals

My goal is to complete a Master of Accountancy and become a CPA. I hope to work at an accounting firm in tax where I can continue to learn and help businesses solve problems.

Hobbies/Fun Facts

I love to play tennis, and I’m always watching it in my free time. I also love to read, bake, and keep a journal every day.

Previous Internship

Tax Intern, PricewaterhouseCoopers, Chicago, IL

Makenna Gregurek

Hometown

Johnston, IA

Majors/Minors

Economics and Political Science, Political Risk Analysis Certificate

Career Goals

Following my undergraduate career, I plan to attend law school. I believe obtaining a law degree is an effective way to make change in the world through both political and legal means. Eventually, I would love to practice at a private firm, or work for a federal agency such as the State Department or the Federal Reserve Bank!

Hobbies/Fun Facts

I love to run, read, ski, and play with my dogs! I also love to cook/bake and take care of my plants!

Previous Internships

The Heritage Foundation, Washington, D.C.; U.S. House of Representatives, Washington, D.C.; Iowa Policy and Opinion Lab, Iowa City, IA; Miller-Meeks for Congress, Iowa City, IA; Goodman/Keller P.C., West Des Moines, IA; Iowa Senate, Des Moines, IA

Cole Skelton

Hometown

I am from the cheese curd capitol of the world Ellsworth, WI!

Majors/Minors

Bachelor of Science in Psychology

Career Goals

I will be working for Cottingham & Butler after graduating this summer and I couldn’t be more excited. I hope to become very successful within the company due to my work ethic, and ability to form important and meaningful connections. I plan to utilize much of my salary to invest in real estate until I have enough capital to invest in private equity.

Hobbies/Fun Facts

I served 5 years in the United States Marine Corps where I was fortunate enough to live in Okinawa, Japan for roughly 4 years. Now I live at home with my two Dobermans Freya and Juno in North Liberty. I am a huge motorcycle enthusiast. In my free time I like to go for motorcycle rides, spend time with my dogs, and play video games.

Previous Internship

Employee Benefits Sales Intern, Cottingham & Butler, Dubuque, IA
